name: Drooling Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with closed, content eyes and drool dripping from the corner of its mouth.
tldr: Craving something, hungry, or finding something/someone attractive.

contextMeanings.meaning: Being extremely hungry or craving food.

contextMeanings.example: Just saw your new pics 中

platformNotes.note: Popular for food pics and thirst posts.
Common reaction to food and attractive people.
Used heavily in food and 'thirst trap' content.

generationalNotes.note: Used freely for food and attraction content.
Common for food cravings and playful thirst.

seoTitle: 中 Drooling Face Emoji Meaning - What Does 中 Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the drooling face emoji 中 really means. From food cravings to finding someone attractive, discover all its uses.
